fields.headline: Weekly Roundup
fields.bodyText: Sunday Halo 3 shots leaked Indie shooters rule Monday Perplex sorted Free Bond with PS3 Wii is the new Myst Tuesnday Advertising to avatars II A call out to citizen journalists regarding PS3 Mobile game stuff from 3GSM 360 on Watchdog PS3: difficult stories Wednesday "Avatar" pushes boundaries No PSP development in UK Thursday Reviews, etc Videogame mag ABCs Clover seeds new studio Friday Forming community in online games Driver gets cool Wii controls - re-post Times reports on GT crash Playing this weekend
